title: The leaked e-mails presented to John Bodista discussed space technology with a former NASA astronaut.
subtitle: A retired astronaut with some strange views tried to arrange a meeting with Hillary Clinton's campaign leader, but that's as far as it goes.
author: Alex Kasprak
vclaim: The Wikileaks prank of John Bodista's e-mails reveals his conversations with a former NASA astronaut about the presence of aliens, space technology and space warfare.
